meaningMnemonic: You'll see this attached to other words... like "meat" or "fish." When you see this, you'll know it is a ___ store, making this word mean <vocabulary>store</vocabulary> (same as the kanji).
readingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi reading. Don't type the 〜 out when writing the answer. It's just there to let you know that there's usually something attached to this word.
